p: As shown in TablesÂ ( 3 and 4), the 21-day PNEO treatment at all doses did not produce any noticeable sign of toxicity, changes in body weight or abnormalities in the biochemical parameters such as AST, ALP, ALT, glucose, urea, creatinine and triglycerides. The only parameter, total cholesterol was significantly reduced by the PNEO (10 and 50 mg/kg) treatment.
